attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament now and call an election NO CONFIDENCE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Parliament is in crisis. The Country has lost all faith in Brown's team and this is making the role of Government impossible. It is time to allow the people to\ decide. Brown was not elected leader and has led the Counrty into crisis. History will mark his period as the time of indecision and U turns. Time to go, do the decent thing please, for the sake of the hard working electorate. Go before its all too late.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
